item.title: Azure Notes
item.description: Azure is Microsoft’s cloud platform. It helps you run websites, store data, use databases, build apps, and more. It offers:- IaaS (you manage apps, Azure manages hardware) PaaS (Azure handles most of the setup for you) It works well with Microsoft tools and supports many programming languages.
